projects.title: Room Homepage
projects.description: This small homepage challenge packs a big punch to test your layout skills. There's also a slider in there to add a JS layer for extra practice.
projects.info: A single page app built on html5, CSS and Vue. It has a dynamic image gallery and an adaptable design to mobile devices.

projects.title: E-commerce product page
projects.description: In this challenge, you'll build a beautiful product page. We'll be putting your JS skills to the test with a lightbox product gallery and cart functionality!.
projects.info: A single page app built on html5, CSS and Vue. It has a dynamic image gallery and an adaptable design to mobile devices.

projects.title: IP address tracker
projects.description: In this challenge, you'll be using two separate APIs together to create an IP Address Tracking app.
projects.info: A single page app built on html5, CSS and Vue. It has a dynamic image gallery and an adaptable design to mobile devices.

projects.title: Ping single column coming soon page
projects.description: This challenge is great for beginners and offers a chance to practice basic client-side form validation.
projects.info: A single page app built on html5, CSS and Vue. It has a dynamic image gallery and an adaptable design to mobile devices.

projects.title: Single price grid component
projects.description: In this challenge, you will build out the pricing component to the designs provided. This is perfect for beginners and people who want to complete a smaller challenge.
projects.info: A single page app built on html5, CSS and Vue. It has a dynamic image gallery and an adaptable design to mobile devices.

projects.title: Huddle landing page with curved sections
projects.description: Practice using pseudo-elements for styling extras and the CSS position property for the sections with curved edges.
projects.info: A single page app built on html5, CSS and Vue. It has a dynamic image gallery and an adaptable design to mobile devices.
